Generalized Linear Mixed Models¶

class limix_inference.ExpFamEP(prodlik, covariates, Q0, Q1, S0)[source]¶

Expectation Propagation for exponential family distributions.

Models

\[y_i ~|~ z_i \sim \text{ExpFam}(y_i ~|~ \mu_i = g(z_i))\]

for

\[\mathbf z \sim \mathcal N\big(~~ \mathbf a^\intercal \boldsymbol\alpha;~ \sigma_b^2 \mathrm Q_0 \mathrm S_0 \mathrm Q_0^{\intercal} + \sigma_{\epsilon}^2 \mathrm I ~~\big)\]
Parameters:
  • prodlik (object) – likelihood product.
  • covariates (array_like) – fixed-effect covariates.
  • Q0 (array_like) – eigenvectors of positive eigenvalues.
  • Q1 (array_like) – eigenvectors of zero eigenvalues.
  • S0 (array_like) – positive eigenvalues.
environmental_variance¶

Environmental variance.

Returns:\(\sigma_{\epsilon}^2\).
genetic_variance¶

Genetic variance.

Returns:\(\sigma_b^2\).
heritability¶

Returns \(\sigma_b^2/(\sigma_a^2+\sigma_b^2+\sigma_{\epsilon}^2)\).
